General_Description: '''Arrows of Destruction''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens]]' [[Athenian army|military]] must be weakened in an enemy state before it grows too powerful." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed a number of Athenian [[soldier]]s in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Children of Athens]] and [[Sparta's Wrath]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
